## Buffer.createIndexBuffer() method

Create a buffer for vertex indices.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createIndexBuffer(options: {
        context: Context;
        indexDatatype: number;
        typedArray?: BufferSource;
        sizeInBytes?: number;
        usage: BufferUsage;
    }): Buffer;
```
